DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate whether PF-04523655 safe treatment neovascular/wet AMD
DOC.brief_title: Study PF-04523655 ( REDD14NP ) In Subjects With Choroidal Neovascularization ( CNV ) Secondary Age-Related Macular Degeneration ( Wet AMD )
DOC.criteria: Patient ≥ 50 year old general good health . Patients medically control chronic disease HTN , AODM , hyperlipidemia may include . Patient capable give consent . Patient willing able comply visit schedule study procedure include followup visit . Patient document CNV secondary AMD evidence active disease characterize blood vessel leakage evidence hemorrhage . Patient clear ocular medium adequate pupil dilation allow good quality image fundus photography . Patient 's intraocular pressure ≤ 25 mmHg Patient childbearing potential . Every female patient consider childbearing potential unless sterilization surgery postmenopausal menstrual period least 12 month . Patient CNV due cause AMD , include ocular periocular infection . Patient lesion easily image quantify . Patient underlying systemic disease cardiac , neurological , infectious disease , uncontrolled diabetes mellitis , disease eye AMD . Patient may medically control glaucoma . Patient participate concurrent interventional study .
